title: Soccer Shooting Skill Improvement Program Applying an Ecological Dynamics Training Environment

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Emphasis on designing dynamic environments resembling actual game situations and enhancing analytical competencies.

learning_goals: Learners can apply shooting timing decision strategies based on defender proximity with 80% accuracy.
Learners can analyze and predict defender movement patterns in three proximity zones (one-touch/two-touch/three-touch).
Learners can create three customized training scenarios using dynamic training design simulation tools on an online LMS platform.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
